source: TEXT_GAIUSA904_00799_SEQ_00<tab>Medrod is troubled by the dearth of new developments in the murder investigation.
target: TEXT_GAIUSA904_00799_SEQ_00<tab>フォールゴウドの山師メドロドは、事件について考え込んでいるようだ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA904_00799_SEQ_01<tab>While uncertain for a time, Ivaurault is now convinced that it was a winged eyeball that he encountered at the rocky area to the west. There may well be another victim out there, waiting to be discovered. The three friends would leave the task of investigating to the expert─you.
target: TEXT_GAIUSA904_00799_SEQ_01<tab>「目玉の化け物」がフォールゴウドの西の岩場にいた可能性があるようだ。まだ見つかっていない死体もあるかもしれない。痕跡を探してみよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA904_00799_SEQ_02<tab>As the three friends had feared, there was indeed another victim. The authorities must be informed. Bear your grisly find back to Fallgourd Float, and show it to Aethelmaer.
target: TEXT_GAIUSA904_00799_SEQ_02<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E87DD01 /var>を回収することができた。フォールゴウドの「エーセルメール牙曹長」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E87DD01 /var>」を渡そう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA904_00799_SEQ_03<tab>A cursory examination of the body turns up a button engraved with a lily motif. A similar object had been discovered upon an earlier victim. Could this be a clue to solving the mysterious deaths?
target: TEXT_GAIUSA904_00799_SEQ_03<tab>エーセルメール牙曹長が、死体から白百合が彫られたボタンをみつけた。これを手がかりに、怪事件を解決に導けるかもしれない。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA904_00799_TODO_00<tab>Search for a maiden's corpse west of Fallgourd.
target: TEXT_GAIUSA904_00799_TODO_00<tab>フォールゴウドの西で化け物の痕跡を調査

source: TEXT_GAIUSA904_00799_TODO_01<tab>Present the ravaged corpse to Aethelmaer.
target: TEXT_GAIUSA904_00799_TODO_01<tab>エーセルメール牙曹長に<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E87DD01 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_GAIUSA904_00799_MEDROD_000_000<tab><sigh> There've been no promising leads in the murders. I can scarce get a wink of sleep, knowing that the killer is still at large.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA904_00799_MEDROD_000_000うーん、パッとした情報が出ねぇなぁ。
これじゃ、いつまで経っても、
怪事件の真相にたどりつかねぇ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA904_00799_MEDROD_000_001<tab>Judging by your furrowed brows, I take it this sorry business troubles you as much as it does me.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA904_00799_MEDROD_000_001……って、どうしたイヴォロー。
やけに浮かない顔してるな？

source: TEXT_GAIUSA904_00799_IVAURAULT_000_002<tab>I had been pondering my encounter. I was uncertain for a time, but there can be no doubt: it was a winged eyeball that I witnessed. It's implausible that I could have mistaken so distinct a creature for a banemite.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA904_00799_IVAURAULT_000_002……やっぱり、見間違えだとは思えないんですよ！
僕が見たのはではなく、
「目玉の化け物」だったはずなんです！

source: TEXT_GAIUSA904_00799_MEDROD_000_003<tab>But you and I were malms apart. How could we have both seen it at precisely the same time?
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA904_00799_MEDROD_000_003そうは言っても、俺が行ってた採掘現場と
お前が行ってた現場とじゃ、距離が開きすぎてら。
同じ時刻に、同じ化け物を見れるはずがねぇや。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA904_00799_MEDROD_000_004<tab>What's more, our adventurer friend here had a run-in with the banemite at the very spot you claimed to see that fiendish eyeball. Isn't that right?
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA904_00799_MEDROD_000_004それに、このにも見てきてもらったんだろ？
現れたのは、蜘蛛の魔物だったそうじゃないか。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA904_00799_IVAURAULT_000_005<tab>There must be an explanation! I <var 1A 02 /var>know<var 1A 01 /var> I saw an eyeball with wings─I would wager an apple tart on it!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA904_00799_IVAURAULT_000_005それでも、見たんです！
巨大な目玉に羽が生えたような、不気味な化け物だった。
今夜のアップルタルトを賭けてもいい！

source: TEXT_GAIUSA904_00799_AIDEEN_000_006<tab>Oooh, he's serious. But listen, mayhap it's not as mysterious as we're making it out to be. There's no reason why there couldn't be─
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA904_00799_AIDEEN_000_006お、そりゃ本気だね。
「目玉の化け物」が何匹いるかハッキリしないなら、
一匹くらい、イヴォローの方にいたかもよ？

source: TEXT_GAIUSA904_00799_AIDEEN_000_007<tab><gasp> Gods, of course... There must be <var 1A 02 /var>more than one<var 1A 01 /var> of the buggers! Ugh, it's so obvious. But then that means...since there have been repeated sightings of these fiends...then there must be even more victims as yet undiscovered...
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA904_00799_AIDEEN_000_007……ん？
ってことは、イヴォローがいた西の岩場に、
まだ見つかってない死体があるかも……？

source: TEXT_GAIUSA904_00799_MEDROD_000_009<tab>I-I do believe we're out of our depth. We ought to leave the rest to the expert.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA904_00799_MEDROD_000_009こ、ここから先は、専門家に任せた方がよさそうだな！
俺たちは、た、ただの山師だしッ！
……うっうっ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA904_00799_AIDEEN_000_010<tab>Y-Yes, we're just civilians, after all. Good luck, adventurer. It was a pleasure knowing you!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA904_00799_AIDEEN_000_010そ、そうだよねぇ～！
冒険者さん、短い間だったけど、楽しかったよ！

source: TEXT_GAIUSA904_00799_IVAURAULT_000_011<tab>While I burn to know the truth, some things are best left unknown. Lest you have forgotten, it was at the rocky area to the west that I had my encounter.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA904_00799_IVAURAULT_000_011真相はとっても気になりますが……
ほ、ほら、知らない方がいいこともあるでしょう？
西の岩場の調査は、冒険者さんにお任せしますね。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA904_00799_IVAURAULT_000_012<tab>Should you discover aught of note, you will want to alert the authorities. There is a guardhouse nearby. The Serpents there should be pleased for any information that pertains to the security of the region.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA904_00799_IVAURAULT_000_012何か見つけちゃった場合は「双蛇党」の詰所へ……。
僕らはあとでこっそり顛末を聞いて、
酒のサカナにでもさせてもらいますよ。

TEXT_GAIUSA904_00799_DUMMY_000_015（指定地点で遺体にアクセスして入手
　近寄るとハウケタの使い魔に襲われる）

source: TEXT_GAIUSA904_00799_AETHELMAER_000_020<tab>Greetings, adventurer. Is there aught I might assist you with?
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA904_00799_AETHELMAER_000_020「双蛇党」への相談なら、私が受けよう。
……もしや、何か事件でも？

TEXT_GAIUSA904_00799_AETHELMAER_000_021……なるほど。
人探しのために怪事件を調べていたところ、
この死体を発見した、と。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA904_00799_AETHELMAER_000_022<tab>No matter how many bodies I see, I cannot seem to get used to the horrid sight. Poor woman...
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA904_00799_AETHELMAER_000_022酷いな……。
近頃、同じような死体が、中央森林でも発見されていてな。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA904_00799_AETHELMAER_000_023<tab>Identical deaths have been reported in the Central Shroud. While the masked stranger you seek does not seem to feature in any, sightings of the winged eyeball are common enough. The creature appears to be <var 1A 02 /var>moving<var 1A 01 /var> the bodies, but to what end, none can say.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA904_00799_AETHELMAER_000_023「仮面の男」についての報告は聞かないが、
「目玉の化け物」ならば、たびたび目撃されている。
どうやら、奴らが死体を運んでいるらしいな。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA904_00799_AETHELMAER_000_024<tab>The victims have all been young women. All are found with their faces mutilated beyond recognition. It's been difficult to identify them, so as to notify their next of─
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA904_00799_AETHELMAER_000_024死体はすべて、若い女性のもの。
このような状態では身元も調べられず、
我々も手を焼いて……ん？

source: TEXT_GAIUSA904_00799_AETHELMAER_000_025<tab>Hm? This button, engraved with a lily motif... The very same object was found upon another victim. A family sigil, or that of an organization, perhaps?
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA904_00799_AETHELMAER_000_025白百合が彫られたボタン……
前に発見された死体にも、同じ物がついていたな。
珍しい装飾だったので、よく覚えている。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA904_00799_AETHELMAER_000_026<tab>Either way, I dare to hope that this find will prove pivotal in solving the murders.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA904_00799_AETHELMAER_000_026何かの組織か、あるいは家紋か……？
お手柄だ、)) (( )) 03 /var>。
お前のおかげで、この怪事件が進展するやもしれんぞ。
TEXT_GAIUSA904_00799_ACCESS_MESSAGE<tab>その行動は出現した敵を倒さないと実行できません
